title: Grateful Dead Live at Recreation Hall University of California Davis on 1982-03-14
venue: Recreation Hall University of California Davis
lineage: Master Cassettes (Nakamichi CR-7A)> Tascam DA-3000 (DSF 1-bit/5.6 MHz) > dBpoweramp 24/96 > Adobe Audition CC 2020 > TLH flac2496
source: 1st Set: Mark Severson's Master (FOB) Audience Cassettes; 3 x Nakamichi 700 cardioids (center -3db) L/R 95 degrees, center down 20 degrees > Mixer (equal balance) > Sony D5M (30' from stage, row L, seat 8)  2nd Set: Mark Severson's Master (FOB) Audience Cassettes; 2 x Nakamichi 700 cardioids (left/right), 1 x Nakamichi 700 omni (center, -6db), L/R 80 degrees, center up 10 degrees > Mixer (equal balance) Sony D5M (30' from stage, row L, seat 8)
